			return;
		}
		
		$meta_query = array(
			array(
				'key'     => 'internal',
				'value'   => '1',

		$query->set( 'meta_query', $meta_query );
		$query->set( 'posts_per_page', -1 );
		$query->set( 'custom_doctors_sort', true );
		
		// Disabilita cache non necessarie
		$query->set( 'update_post_term_cache', false );
		$query->set( 'cache_results', false );
	}

	function modify_doctor_query_clauses( $clauses, $query ) {
		if ( true !== $query->get( 'custom_doctors_sort' ) ) {
			return $clauses;

		global $wpdb;
		
		// Join ottimizzato con INNER JOIN quando possibile
		$clauses['join'] .= "

 * OTTIMIZZATO: Query services archive con indice composito per tassonomia service_cat
 */
function setup_services_archive_query( $query ) {
	if ( is_admin() || ! $query->is_main_query() ) {
		return;
	}
	
	// Controlla se siamo in una pagina di archivio della tassonomia service_cat
	if ( ! is_tax( 'service_cat' ) && ! is_post_type_archive( 'service' ) ) {
		return;
	}

	$query->set( 'post_type', 'service' );
	$query->set( 'posts_per_page', -1 );
	$query->set( 'custom_services_sort', true );
	
	// Disabilita cache non necessarie
	$query->set( 'update_post_term_cache', false );
	$query->set( 'cache_results', false );
}
